022import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
023import static org.junit.Assert.assertNotNull;
024import static org.junit.Assert.fail;
025
026import java.util.Locale;
027
028import org.apache.fulcrum.cache.GlobalCacheService;
029import org.apache.fulcrum.crypto.CryptoService;
030import org.apache.fulcrum.factory.FactoryService;
031import org.apache.fulcrum.intake.IntakeService;
032import org.apache.fulcrum.localization.LocalizationService;
033import org.apache.fulcrum.mimetype.MimeTypeService;
034import org.apache.turbine.annotation.AnnotationProcessor;
035import org.apache.turbine.annotation.TurbineService;
036import org.apache.turbine.services.avaloncomponent.AvalonComponentService;
037import org.apache.turbine.test.BaseTestCase;
038import org.apache.turbine.util.TurbineConfig;
039import org.apache.turbine.util.TurbineException;
040import org.junit.AfterClass;
041import org.junit.BeforeClass;
042import org.junit.Test;
043
044/**
045 * Unit test for verifing that we can load all the appropriate components from the
046 * appropriate Container.  For now that is just ECM (AvalonComponentService)
047 * but in the future with mixed containers there could be multiple.
048 *
049 * @author <a href="mailto:epugh@upstate.com">Eric Pugh</a>
050 * @author <a href="mailto:sgoeschl@apache.org">Siegfried Goeschl</a>
051 * @version $Id$
052 */
053public class LoadingComponentsTest extends BaseTestCase
054{
055    private static TurbineConfig tc = null;
056    
057    @TurbineService
058    GlobalCacheService cacheService;
059
060    @BeforeClass
061    public static void setUp() throws Exception
062    {
063        tc = new TurbineConfig(".", "/conf/test/TestFulcrumComponents.properties");
064        tc.initialize();
065    }
066    @AfterClass
067    public static void tearDown() throws Exception
068    {
069        if (tc != null)
070        {
071            tc.dispose();
072        }
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Test to load a couple of Avalon services directly by the
077     * AvalonComponentService.
078     *
079     * @throws Exception loading failed
080     */
081    @Test public void testLoadingByAvalonComponentService() throws Exception
082    {
083        AvalonComponentService avalonComponentService =
084            (AvalonComponentService) TurbineServices.getInstance().getService(
085                    AvalonComponentService.SERVICE_NAME);
086
087        assertNotNull(avalonComponentService);
088
089        GlobalCacheService dgcs = (GlobalCacheService)avalonComponentService.lookup(GlobalCacheService.ROLE);
090        assertNotNull(dgcs);
091        CryptoService cs = (CryptoService)avalonComponentService.lookup(CryptoService.ROLE);
092        assertNotNull(cs);
093        LocalizationService ls = (LocalizationService)avalonComponentService.lookup(LocalizationService.ROLE);
094        assertNotNull(ls);
095        IntakeService intake = (IntakeService)avalonComponentService.lookup(IntakeService.ROLE);
096        assertNotNull(intake);
097        FactoryService fs = (FactoryService)avalonComponentService.lookup(FactoryService.ROLE);
098        assertNotNull(fs);
099        MimeTypeService mimetype = (MimeTypeService)avalonComponentService.lookup(MimeTypeService.ROLE);
100        assertNotNull(mimetype);
101        //avalonComponentService.shutdown();
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Test to load a couple of Avalon services by using the
106     * TurbineServices which delegate the service retrieval to
107     * the AvalonComponentService
108     *
109     * @throws Exception loading failed
110     */
111    @Test public void testLoadingByTurbineServices() throws Exception
112    {
113        ServiceManager serviceManager = TurbineServices.getInstance();
114
115        GlobalCacheService gcs = (GlobalCacheService)serviceManager.getService(GlobalCacheService.ROLE);
116        assertNotNull(gcs);
117        CryptoService cs = (CryptoService)serviceManager.getService(CryptoService.ROLE);
118        assertNotNull(cs);
119        LocalizationService ls = (LocalizationService)serviceManager.getService(LocalizationService.ROLE);
120        assertNotNull(ls);
121        IntakeService intake = (IntakeService)serviceManager.getService(IntakeService.ROLE);
122        assertNotNull(intake);
123        FactoryService fs = (FactoryService)serviceManager.getService(FactoryService.ROLE);
124        assertNotNull(fs);
125        MimeTypeService mimetype = (MimeTypeService)serviceManager.getService(MimeTypeService.ROLE);
126        assertNotNull(mimetype);
127    }
128    
129    @Test public void testLoadingByAnnotation() throws TurbineException
130    {
131        AnnotationProcessor.process(this);
132        assertNotNull(cacheService);
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * Lookup up an unknown servie
137     * @throws Exception
138     */
139    @Test public void testLookupUnknownService() throws Exception
140    {
141        ServiceManager serviceManager = TurbineServices.getInstance();
142
143        try
144        {
145            serviceManager.getService("foo");
146            fail("We expect an InstantiationException");
147        }
148        catch (InstantiationException e)
149        {
150            // that'w what we expect
151            return;
152        }
153        catch (Throwable t)
154        {
155            fail("We expect an InstantiationException");
156        }
157    }
158
159    /**
160     * Shutdown the AvalonComponentService where the MimeTypeService
161     * resides and lookup the MimeTypeService. This should trigger
162     * a late initialization of AvalonComponentService and returns
163     * a fully functional MimeTypeService.
164     */
165    @Test public void testAvalonComponentServiceShutdown() throws Exception
166    {
167        ServiceManager serviceManager = TurbineServices.getInstance();
168        serviceManager.shutdownService(AvalonComponentService.SERVICE_NAME);
169
170        MimeTypeService mimeTypeService = (MimeTypeService) serviceManager.getService(MimeTypeService.class.getName());
171        assertNotNull(mimeTypeService);
172
173        Locale locale = new Locale("en", "US");
174        String s = mimeTypeService.getCharSet(locale);
175        assertEquals("ISO-8859-1", s);
176    }
177
178}
